Description: Very nice 2 bedroom 1 bath single family house (approx 1300 sq ft) in excellent condition on quiet street in great Waltham location close to Watertown and Belmont line with easy access to Boston, Cambridge, Newton, major roads, shops, buses, etc. Hardwood floors, living room, dining room, very nice kitchen with dishwasher, new nicely updated bathroom, 2 bedrooms. Large basement for storage. Driveway parking. Nice back yard space. washer/dryer in basement. Central a/c! First/Last/Fee.
